test_checklist.requirement: OT-001 ปรับปรุงเครื่องมือกำหนดจุดติดตั้งมิเตอร์ใหม่ กรณีที่ไม่มีมิเตอร์ข้างเคียง ให้สามารถกำหนดจุดอ้างอิงจากตำแหน่งสายไฟฟ้าแรงต่ำแทนได้
testchecklist: Verify that the system allows users to set a new meter installation point using the position of low-voltage power cables when there is no adjacent meter.
Check if the system correctly identifies and uses the position of low-voltage power cables as a reference point for setting a new meter installation point.
Ensure that the system does not allow setting a new meter installation point without a valid reference point.
Test the system to ensure it does not allow setting a new meter installation point using a reference point that is not a low-voltage power cable position.

test_checklist.requirement: OT-002 ปรับปรุงให้รองรับการขยายเขตระบบ 3 เฟส
testchecklist: Verify that the system can handle and display data for a 3-phase expansion.
Check if the system correctly identifies and displays the 3-phase expansion in the user interface.
Ensure that the system does not display or handle data for a 3-phase expansion incorrectly.
Test the system to ensure it can handle and display data for a 3-phase expansion in various scenarios.

test_checklist.requirement: OT-003 เพิ่มข้อมูลในเขต/นอกเขต/นิคมอุตสาหกรรม พร้อมรหัสนิคมอุตสาหกรรม และพื้นที่บริการ (SCS)
testchecklist: Verify that the system can add data for areas within, outside, and industrial estates, including industrial estate codes and service areas (SCS).
Check if the system correctly identifies and displays the added data for areas within, outside, and industrial estates, including industrial estate codes and service areas (SCS).
Ensure that the system does not add or display incorrect data for areas within, outside, and industrial estates, including industrial estate codes and service areas (SCS).
Test the system to ensure it can add and display data for areas within, outside, and industrial estates, including industrial estate codes and service areas (SCS) in various scenarios.

test_checklist.requirement: OT-004 ปรับปรุงให้รองรับการดึงมิเตอร์ทุกประเภทมิเตอร์ทั้งแรงสูง และแรงต่ำ (SCS)
testchecklist: Verify that the system can retrieve data for all types of meters, including high and low voltage meters, in the SCS (System Control Station) format.
Check if the system correctly identifies and displays data for all types of meters, including high and low voltage meters, in the SCS format.
Ensure that the system does not display or handle data for all types of meters, including high and low voltage meters, incorrectly in the SCS format.
Test the system to ensure it can retrieve and display data for all types of meters, including high and low voltage meters, in the SCS format in various scenarios.

test_checklist.requirement: OT-005 ปรับปรุงโปรแกรมประยุกต์ให้รองรับการใช้งานด้วย Protocol https
testchecklist: Verify that the system can handle and display data using the HTTPS protocol.
Check if the system correctly identifies and displays data using the HTTPS protocol.
Ensure that the system does not display or handle data using the HTTPS protocol incorrectly.
Test the system to ensure it can handle and display data using the HTTPS protocol in various scenarios.

test_checklist.requirement: OT-006 Classify Symbol สายแรงต่ำแยกตามเฟสเหมือน OPSA ซึ่งจะมีผลกับ OT ด้วย
testchecklist: Verify that the system can classify symbols for low-voltage lines by phase, similar to OPSA, and this classification will affect OT.
Check if the system correctly identifies and displays the classification of low-voltage lines by phase, similar to OPSA, and this classification will affect OT.
Ensure that the system does not classify or display low-voltage lines by phase, similar to OPSA, incorrectly, and this classification does not affect OT.
Test the system to ensure it can classify and display low-voltage lines by phase, similar to OPSA, and this classification will affect OT in various scenarios.
